name: PixiTracker Module
summary: A PIXIMOD file is a song created by Nightradio PixiTracker, a music tracker program. It contains song data, such as notes and sounds, in the PixiTracker Module (PIXIMOD) format that the program loads to play synthesized music. PixiTracker users typically save songs as PIXIMOD files and then convert them to more widely supported formats, such as .XM or .WAV files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: PIXIMOD file open in Nightradio PixiTracker 1.6
